headline: The Fossil Fuel Wars: S&P 500 Giants, AI Data Centers And Russian Sanctions
summary: Early in December, S&P 500 giant Exxon Mobil went against the industry grain and boosted its capital spending outlook.  Exxon said it would hold its purse steady through 2025, then boost its allocated spending through the end of the decade.  The move came as OPEC+ continues reining in production.
